value.title: StarCraft 2: Legacy of the Void - Playing Defensive in Zerg vs Zerg!
value.excerpt: Zerg versus Zerg can be a difficult match-up. Often times it is hard to judge if you are behind or ahead and it can be difficult to decide how you want to follow up early game aggression. In this video of Zerg versus Zerg I go over the follow-up, after defending early game aggression.  In this particular
